declarations.name: fizzBuzz
declarations.body: fun fizzBuzz(n: Int) { fun getFizzBuzzString(number: Int): String { return when { number % 3 == 0 && number % 5 == 0 -> "FizzBuzz" number % 3 == 0 -> "Fizz" number % 5 == 0 -> "Buzz" else -> number.toString() } } for (i in 1..n) { println(getFizzBuzzString(i)) } }

declarations.name: getFizzBuzzString
declarations.body: fun getFizzBuzzString(number: Int): String { return when { number % 3 == 0 && number % 5 == 0 -> "FizzBuzz" number % 3 == 0 -> "Fizz" number % 5 == 0 -> "Buzz" else -> number.toString() }}
